item.title: PROBE HEAT LIGHTS (EXCEPT CAPT AND F/O PITOT) – ANGLE OF ATTACK (AOA) AND TEMPERATURE (TAT) PROBE HEAT LIGHTS – HEATER INOP

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated probe heater is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Angle of Attack Sensor Heater Systems or Temperature (TAT) Probe Heater Systems.

placard.para: Placard appropriate "HEAT LIGHT INOP” and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
